title: OBLIGATORY PARTICIPATION The participation of landowners and slum dwellers in Slum Rehabilitation Scheme shall be obligatory
clause_text: OBLIGATORY PARTICIPATION The participation of landowners and slum dwellers in Slum Rehabilitation Scheme shall be obligatory. This participation shall be governed by following regulations,
section: Provision relating to allotment of tenements either in situ or otherwise, on ownership or on rent to the other non-protected occupiers

source_pdf.filename: UDCPR Updated 30.01.25 with earlier provisions & corrections_compressed.docx
